about_the_game:
...he's just been turned into a vampire. Well, actually, he has two problems, because he's also found himself on Fledgling Manor, the hottest vampire reality show in America.

Eight new vampires are forced to live together in a remote mansion. Each episode, they must vote off one of their fellow Fledglings. But the losing contestant isn't just forced to leave the show — they're executed for the pleasure of the viewing audience.

Can Rocky live long enough to figure out what happened to him? How will he deal with his fellow Fledglings? Find out in Fledgling Manor, a supernatural horror visual novel.

  • Three romance-able characters

  • Over 120,000 words long

  • Eight different characters to get to know and condemn to death

  • Striking black and white visual style

  • Original soundtrack by kendall :3

  • Three routes, each with unique CGs

  • Half a dozen possible endings (including some bad ends ;)

Our Protagonist is a grocery delivery app driver, avid reality show viewer, and former bass player for a local metal band. He's also the proud owner of a white 2004 Toyota Corolla! But Rocky was turned into a vampire under mysterious circumstances... How did he get here!?

Possible Love Interest Aanya hunted the streets of Atlanta for victims while dressed as a nurse before she was caught and put on Fledgling Manor. What's hiding behind her warm exterior?

Possible Love Interest Eight has a mysterious past, a creepy mask, and... a very friendly personality! Where did they come from, and why are they here?

Possible Love Interest Stefan doesn't understand TV shows and certainly doesn't want to be part of one. Get out of his way. He's got hunting to do.

ALSO FEATURING:

Tay (22) a Christianity and candles influencer, Grace (50) a corporate girlboss, Jason (24) a grindset hunk, Lilia (23) a sad Canadian.

with special appearances by Niko and Bug, from artist+character designer Shaydh's comic And the Streets Awash in Blood.

content_descriptors.notes: Fledgling Manor contains strong language, violence (small amounts of blood are depicted visually but violence is described in text only), character death, and optional, non-explicit intimate romantic scenes.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.10+
  • Processor: MacOS version 10.13.4 or 10.14.1 or 10.15.4 or newer
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0

name: Fledgling Manor

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or DirectX 11

dejus.descriptors:
Violência Extrema
Conteúdo sexual
Drogas ilícitas

short_description: A supernatural horror visual novel where vampires compete to save their eternal unlives in a high-stakes reality show.
